message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing [product name] and I think you'd really love it. I'm asking for $200 for it, but I'm open to reasonable offers. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm interested in the [product name] but I'm only able to pay $150.  Would you be willing to consider that?
